forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 45. West southwest wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny, with a high near 53. West southwest wind 2 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening settles into Downtown San Francisco, a veil of clouds drapes softly over the city, weaving a delicate tapestry of mystery and allure. The low temperature dances around 45 degrees, with gentle breezes whispering through the streets, adding a touch of crispness to the air. The fog, a familiar companion of this urban landscape, hides the far reaches of the Golden Gate, while the heart of the city remains illuminated, casting glimmers of light against the muted backdrop. 

Tomorrow brings a promise of partly sunny skies, as the sun peeks shyly through the clouds and the high nudges toward a cool 53 degrees. The day beckons one to embrace layers; a light sweater or a cozy jacket is wise, especially as the marine layer may linger, reminding us of the ocean’s embrace. A stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely coffee at a neighborhood café could be the perfect way to enjoy the muted beauty of this winter day, encouraging one to slow down and savor the simple moments before the day unfurls around them.
